title: IIITD Playbook
description: The only guide to hack IIITD. The playbook was created to provide IIITD students with multiple strategies that other students use, their experiences and stories, tools they can use to help them along their way through college.

title: Color Switch
description: A clone of the popular game Color Switch for desktop. Utilised concepts of Object-Oriented and Event-Driven programming. Worked in a team of 2.

title: lohanish
description: Coded a Linux shell called 'lohanish' implementing a total of 30 commands using C. Utilised several standard C and Linux libraries.

title: Perceptris
description: Built a futuristic version of the game Tetris which uses ultrasonic and touch sensors along with LED bulbs to make the game more human-interactive. Can be played in both Single and Multiplayer modes. Worked in a team of 3 under the guidance of Dr. Aman Parnami.
